title: Reserve ratio
context: §383-67 Reserve ratio. For the calendar year 1970 and for each calendar year thereafter, an employer&rsquo;s reserve ratio shall be determined by dividing the employer&rsquo;s most recent reserve balance by the employer&rsquo;s most recent average annual payroll. The ratio shall be rounded to the nearest ten-thousandths. [L 1941, c 304, §1, pt of subs 21; RL 1945, §4252; am L 1945, c 19, §1(5); am L 1949, c 316, §1(4); am L 1951, c 195, §1(7); am L 1953, c 41, §1(9), (10); RL 1955, §93-66; am L 1964, c 55, §9; HRS §383-67; am L 1969, c 277, §2; gen ch 1985]
